flow.informationArchitecture: Hierarchical: Organization overview → Proposal list with nested metadata (BIP ID, vote count, time remaining)

Vote count and follower metrics use abbreviated format (1.1k) that requires parsing
progressIndicators: Proposal status indicator: 'Xd left' shows voting timeline
Active proposal count in hero: '896 proposals'

No suggestion for what page user might have meant to visit
